```{r, include = F}
library(ggplot2)
```

## Exemple de travail RAINET

On fait un petit exemple d'analyse.

## Analyse stat Iris

```{r, echo=F, echo = F}
mod = lm(iris$Sepal.Length ~ iris$Sepal.Width)
sum.mod = summary(mod)
#sum.mod
sum.mod$adj.r.squared
```

## On affiche le graph

```{r}
#| echo: false
#| warning: false

mon_plot = ggplot(data = iris, aes (x = Sepal.Width, y = Sepal.Length)) + 
  geom_point()

mon_plot
```

The `echo: false` option disables the printing of code (only output is displayed).
